Hi,

First time trying to use Quest and I'm wondering what exactly happens with the stuff we put in the description of the game itself.

It doesn't get displayed when the game begins. I've tried the command "about" and it displays the game's name, author, version and IFID but not the description. Does the description actually get seen any time during gameplay? Or is there a way for us to display it?

Thanks

Posts.EditableText:
Game description is used when you upload the game to the server. It is on the game's page to describe it to those viewing the game.

I believe that is what it is for.
